channel.title: Need a small tip [all view this]
channel.description: ok ive got my server running thru hamachi.. but im trying to get it online on my behalf.... ik ive protfowarded pefectly.. its placing the ips in the client.java and in my server.java wich ip goes were? please help

item.title: Need a small tip [all view this]
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

In your client, use the ip 0.0.0.0 in your client, compile then it should work. Keep a client for yourself and your players seperate.

Read full topic
